titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on the Budget.

calendar.text: Committee on Budget ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Budget. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Chiles. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered favorably reported an original resolution (S.Res. 381) in lieu of this measure.

bill.summary: 2/1/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Committee on the Budget, from March 1, 1988, through February 28, 1989, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize, on a reimbursable basis, the services of department or agency personnel; and (4) procure consultant services.
